eventName.description: Name of the event (1-3 words maximum, e.g., 'US Open', 'Summer Streets')

eventType.description: Type of event (e.g., sports tournament, fashion week, music festival, seasonal tradition, major concert, convention, cultural festival, etc.)

date.description: Date when the event occurred (ISO format if possible)

location.description: Specific location in NYC where the event took place

extractionDate.description: Date when this data was extracted
